lead_paragraph: BIKOFF--Carole, born Brooklyn, NY August 18, 1929, of Woodbury, NY and Ann Arbor, MI, died March 10, 2016. Daughter of the late Rose Mantel Schwartz and Dr. Emanuel Schwartz, beloved wife of Dr. William Bikoff, adored mother, grandmother, great-grandmother, sister, sister-in-law, mother- in-law, cousin, aunt, niece and friend. We are heartbroken to lose her and filled with joy to have known her. 1/3
